Constants.html#/c:@SpotzInsideNotificati.name: SpotzInsideNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzInsideNotificati.abstract: Notification when spotz is found. SpotzData object of the triggered Spot is available in userInfo[data].

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzOutsideNotificat.name: SpotzOutsideNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzOutsideNotificat.abstract: Notification when previously found spotz is no longer detected. SpotzData object of the triggered Spot is available in userInfo[data].

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzRangingNotificat.name: SpotzRangingNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzRangingNotificat.abstract: Notification when ranging information available. SpotzData object of the triggered Spot is available in userInfo[data].

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzClosestBeaconNot.name: SpotzClosestBeaconNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzClosestBeaconNot.abstract: Notification when ranging information available. This works on top of data collected from SpotzRangingNotification data.

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzInsideSiteGeoNot.name: SpotzInsideSiteGeoNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzInsideSiteGeoNot.abstract: Notification when site geofence is enabled, and enter event is detected. SpotzSiteDetails object is available in userInfo[data].

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzOutsideSiteGeoNo.name: SpotzOutsideSiteGeoNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzOutsideSiteGeoNo.abstract: Notification when site geofence is enabled, and exit event is detected. SpotzSiteDetails object is available in userInfo[data].

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzRTInitSuccessNot.name: SpotzRTInitSuccessNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzRTInitSuccessNot.abstract: Notification when real time init is successfully and first location has been transmitted

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzRTOutsideNotific.name: SpotzRTOutsideNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzRTOutsideNotific.abstract: Notification when realtime spotz is no longer detected.

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzRTDwellNotificat.name: SpotzRTDwellNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzRTDwellNotificat.abstract: Notification when realtime spotz remains found after a certain x period.

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzExtensionNotific.name: SpotzExtensionNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzExtensionNotific.abstract: Notification when a returned data exists during enter/exit Spot events.

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzInitNotification.name: SpotzInitNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzInitNotification.abstract: Notification when Spotz has been initialised. Error object, if any, is available in userInfo[error].

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzSiteInitNotifica.name: SpotzSiteInitNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzSiteInitNotifica.abstract: Notification when Spotz Site initialisation has been completed.

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzErrorNotificatio.name: SpotzErrorNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzErrorNotificatio.abstract: Notification when Spotz reported an error. Error is available in userInfo[error]

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzSiteChangedNotif.name: SpotzSiteChangedNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzSiteChangedNotif.abstract: Notification when Site change occurs. If successful, the new site’s SpotzSiteDetails object is available in userInfo[site].

Constants.html#/c:@SpotzNetworkReachabil.name: SpotzNetworkReachabilityStateChangeNotification
Constants.html#/c:@SpotzNetworkReachabil.abstract: Notification when network reachability services changes status.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: +shared
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns a singleton instance of Spotz

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: +initWithAppId:appKey:delegate:config:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Initialises the service and registers the device with the given API Key and client Key. Must be run to initialise SpotzSDK.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -startSpotz
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Initialises location services and Spots. This must be run to register all Spots. We recommend this to be called at the point where you are ready to prompt user to enable location services (if not yet enabled previously). This will also download the closest site’s data

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -restartSpotz
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Re-Initialises location services and Spots. This must be run to register all Spots. We recommend this to be called at the point where you are ready to prompt user to enable location services (if not yet enabled previously). This will also download the closest site’s data

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -isSpotzStarted
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns Spotz started status.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -spotsAtCurrentSite
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns all spots retrieved based on the default/selected site.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -currentSite
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns the current registered site details

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -availableSites
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Retrieves all available sites

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -changeCurrentSiteId:completion:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Change current site to the given siteId. Upon successful update, it will monitor all Spots inside the site and retrigger the spotzSiteInitSuccessful delegate as well as spotzSiteChangedToSite:error: delegate

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -isInsideSpotWithName:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns true if device is inside the spot

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -isInsideSpotWithId:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns true if device is inside the spot

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -isInsideSpotAtSiteId:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns true if device is inside a spot with the given site ID

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -insideSpots
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns list of SpotzData that are within proximity

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -currentLocation
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Get current device’s location.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -resetSpots
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Reset Spots detected. This will re-trigger all the notifications if the device is within a particular spot. Ensure this is not called inside SpotzInsideNotification notification.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -recheckSpots
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Recheck status of registered Spots. This will re-trigger all notifications if the device is within a particular spot.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -retriggerInsideSpots
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Retrigger SpotzInsideNotification notifications based on spots that are inside. This is a passive

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -stopMonitoring
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Stops all spots monitoring. This will stop Spots (geo/beacon) monitoring only.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -startMonitoring
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Starts spots monitoring. Call this method to startup Spots (geo/beacon) monitoring after stopMonitoring.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -stopSpotz
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Stop spotz service. Run startSpotz to restart the service.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -deviceId
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns the device ID assigned to this device

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -sendFeedbackWithRating:message:attributes:module:completion:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Records feedback ratings for the project/app. This is a simple rating recording function and takes in a numerical rating value which range is to be defined by the developer

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -identity:completion:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Associates the current device with a custom identity. Note that if the app is reinstalled, deviceId will need to be re-associated with the identity.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -removeIdentityWithCompletion:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Removes identity that is mapped to this device

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -updateExtension:type:data:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Updates additional data for the given extension

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -checkLocationServicesStatus:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Checks status of location services

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -checkBluetoothEnabled:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns bluetooth state

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -requestLocationServicesPrompt
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Prompt user to enable location. It will only prompts user when location status is not yet determined.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -enableSpotzEvents:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Set this to false to stop SDK from sending Spotz events. This should be enabled if you have a third party integration.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -isSpotzEventsEnabled
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns the spotz events enabled flag

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -checkAndUpdateSpotz
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Check and download updates if available

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -enableBackgroundLocation
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Enable background location update.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -disableBackgroundLocation
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Stops background location update.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -startBackgroundLocation
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Start background location tracking. SpotzSDK.enableBackgroundLocation must already be called.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -startBackgroundLocationForegroundOnly
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Starts background location however pauses location update when app is not in the foreground.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -pauseBackgroundLocation
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Call this method for a minimum background location call.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -resumeBackgroundLocation
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Resumes backgroundLocation to normal resolution and frequency updates.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -isBackgroundLocationPaused
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Check if background location is on pause. Call resume to start normal background location update.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -stopBackgroundLocation
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Stop background location tracking

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -isBackgroundLocationStarted
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Checks if background location is started

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -isBackgroundLocationEnabled
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Checks if background location is enabled

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -isBackgroundLocationReady
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns true if background location is ready

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -backgroundLocationRecordInterval:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: If background location is enabled, you can adjust the minimum interval of how often location data is recorded, if changed.

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -currentCustomer
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Returns the current logged in customer

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -registerCustomUserId:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Registers custom userId to be used as the tracking identifier

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -getEtaTrackId:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Track ETA based on trackId and location. Result will be returned in notification SpotzRTEtaNotification with userInfo[‘data’] = (trackId,eta in seconds)

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -getEtaTrackId:destination:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Track ETA based on trackId and location. Result will be returned in notification SpotzRTEtaNotification with userInfo[‘data’] = (trackId,eta in seconds)

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -getEtaTrackId:destination:location:
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Retrieves ETA based on track ID and the given location array of (lat,lng). Result will be returned in notification SpotzRTEtaNotification with userInfo[‘data’] = (trackId,eta in seconds)

Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.name: -stopTrackingAllTrackIds
Classes/SpotzSDK.html#/c:objc(cs)SpotzSD.abstract: Stop all tracking all trackIDs

Classes/SpotzSDK.html.name: SpotzSDK
Classes/SpotzSDK.html.abstract: SpotzSDK is the main class that handles the integration between client and Localz’s Spotz Platform
